result.title: Changing "/2" to ">> 1" puts function into infinite recursion?
result.content:
I submitted a successful solution to problem 514C - Watto and Mechanism â€” 34073092 with a recursive function calculating modulo of multiplication of 2 large 64bit integers.

Then, in that function I only changed 

    ll res = mul(a, b/2, m);

to

    ll res = mul(a, b>>1, m);

in 34073105 which both locally and on Codeforces gave me a stack overflow on the function. Why is that happening, if the behavior of /2 is supposedly the same as of >>1 ?
